experience.title: Visiting Researcher
experience.description: Objective: Measurement of Corporate Culture & Financial Performance using Transcripts of US Firms• Extracted the Q/A section from the Earnings Call Transcripts to avoid "cheap talk" inside the Management Presentation section.• Matched company names to GVKEY using Fuzzy matching, then preprocessed and parsed the data using Stanford CoreNLP package.• Used Phraser & word2vec model of Gensim to learn phrases, MWEs & obtained word vectors for each corporate values eg. Innovation.• Measured the corporate culture for each firm year wise and calculated correlations b/w the scores and corresponding firm characteristics.
experience.description_html: Objective: Measurement of Corporate Culture & Financial Performance using Transcripts of US Firms• Extracted the Q/A section from the Earnings Call Transcripts to avoid "cheap talk" inside the Management Presentation section.• Matched company names to GVKEY using Fuzzy matching, then preprocessed and parsed the data using Stanford CoreNLP package.• Used Phraser & word2vec model of Gensim to learn phrases, MWEs & obtained word vectors for each corporate values eg. Innovation.• Measured the corporate culture for each firm year wise and calculated correlations b/w the scores and corresponding firm characteristics.
experience.company: Telfer School of Management at the University of Ottawa

experience.title: Associate Researcher
experience.description: Objective: Prediction of Communication Index between Examiners using USPTO Dataset• Scraped Patent Applications data (SRNTs) using Google API & converted the data into CSVs using Tesseract-OCR & pdf2image.• Preprocessed Data using Pandas to create Examiner-SRNT mapping & then parsed the Data using Regex to eliminate non-alpha characters.• Applied Word Embedding Model using BERT & PyTorch on the Search Strings column of the Data frame to obtain word vectors.• Computed Cosine similarity b/w the word vectors of SRNTs of each examiner with one another to predict the communication index.
experience.description_html: Objective: Prediction of Communication Index between Examiners using USPTO Dataset• Scraped Patent Applications data (SRNTs) using Google API & converted the data into CSVs using Tesseract-OCR & pdf2image.• Preprocessed Data using Pandas to create Examiner-SRNT mapping & then parsed the Data using Regex to eliminate non-alpha characters.• Applied Word Embedding Model using BERT & PyTorch on the Search Strings column of the Data frame to obtain word vectors.• Computed Cosine similarity b/w the word vectors of SRNTs of each examiner with one another to predict the communication index.

experience.title: Technology Secretary
experience.description: • Managed publicity of all the technology events held in Open IIT, General Championship & ensured active participation by students.• Allocated & Channelized the Hall Budget of 2.5L for all the technical requirements of Hall across 10 different technological events.

experience.title: Student Member
experience.description: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Guest Lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship to meet our objective.
experience.description_html: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Guest Lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship to meet our objective.
experience.company: Students'​ Alumni Cell, Office of Alumni Affairs, IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Senior Executive Member
experience.description: • Designed the current website of Gopali Youth Welfare Society Light & mentored 7 Junior Web Design Executive Team members.• Worked and raised fund to provide free education to 250+ underprivileged children at our school Jagrati Vidya Mandir.• Part of Annual Donation Drive Yogdaan 20 team which raised 5 Lacs for the installation of smart classes in our JVM school.
